articles.title: OnePlus won’t sell the 13T in the US or Europe - The Verge
articles.description: OnePlus says its relatively small 13T won’t come to the US or Europe anytime soon.
articles.content: If you were hoping to get your hands on the compact phone OnePlus launched in China last week, youre going to have your work cut out for you. OnePlus spokespeople have confirmed to The Verge that the… [+1411 chars]
